                method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView displayRegistrationForm()

        ModelAndView - sends the user to the registration page with a blank user

                method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView displayLoginForm()

      • registerUser

        @RequestMapping(path="/registerUser",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView registerUser(@Valid @ModelAttribute(value="user")
                                                                                                                                      @Valid User user,
                                                                                                                                      org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        After the user is presses submit on the registration form this method is called to first validate the input of the user is correct. Then will add the user to the data base and send them to the login page to complete the login process
        Parameters:
        user - - User - object containing all variables of the user
        result - - BindingResult - object used to determine if the information inputed was valid
        Returns:
        ModelAndView

      • loginUser

        @RequestMapping(path="/loginUser",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView loginUser(@Valid @ModelAttribute(value="user")
                                                                                                                                @Valid Credentials user,
                                                                                                                                org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result)
        After the user submits their user name and password the loginUser method is called to validate their information and send them to the home page
        Parameters:
        user - - User - object containing all variables of the user
        result - - BindingResult - object used to determine if the information inputed was valid
        Returns:
        ModelAndView - returns the user to a new page based on the information they had given
